scripts.speaker: strapi generate:api speaker title:string
scripts.dockeronstart: yarn add sharp && yarn && strapi start
scripts.generateSpeaker: strapi generate:api speaker title:string isDeleted:boolean type:string internalComment:text isReadOnly:boolean dueDate:datetime jobTitle:string company:string biography:text image:string companyImage:string linkedinProfile:string xingProfile:string completionRate:integer disableSelfService:boolean  mainCategory:json  selfServiceMail:email selfServiceLink:string selfServiceName:string
scripts.generateExhibitor: strapi generate:api exhibitor title:string isDeleted:boolean type:string internalComment:text isReadOnly:boolean dueDate:datetime breakoutRoomUrl:string city:string contactEmail:email contactName:string contactPhone:string country:string description:text disableSelfService:boolean  unavailableMEssage:string iframeUrl:string iframeUrlLabel:string  isSponsor:boolean isSponsorOnly:boolean logo:string mainCategory:json order:integer  releaseData:boolean selfServiceMail:email selfServiceLink:string selfServiceName:string showInteractions:boolean sponsorBanner:string street:string  website:string zip:string
scripts.generateAttendee: strapi generate:api attendee title:string isDeleted:boolean type:string internalComment:text isReadOnly:boolean dueDate:datetime aboutMe:text attending:string allowChats:boolean completionRate:integer disabelSelfService:boolean doNotTrack:boolean email:email company:string  jobTitle:string lastName:string firstName:string newsletter:boolean hideMyProfile:boolean profileImage:string readOnly:boolean selfServiceMail:email selfServiceLink:string selfServideName:string ticketClass:json ticketCode:string extraLabel2:string
scripts.generateSchedule: strapi generate:api schedule title:string isDeleted:boolean type:string internalComment:text isReadOnly:boolean backgroundColor:string capacity:number channels:json description:text  endDate:datetime externalMeetingURL:string externalMeetingURLButtonText:string hasNoDetails:boolean iframeUrl:string  isMainSchedule:boolean isBookable:boolean mainCategory:json mainItemUid:string openInMainDirectly:boolean  startDate:datetime status:string textColor:string   videoUrl:string zoomMeetingId:string zoomMeetingPassword:string zoomMeetingUrl:string
scripts.generateStage: strapi generate:api stage title:string isDeleted:boolean type:string internalComment:text isReadOnly:boolean dueDate:datetime backgroundColor:string  icon:string  isCrossLane:boolean timetableOrder:number  textColor:string
scripts.generateVote: strapi generate:api vote title:string isDeleted:boolean type:string internalComment:text isReadOnly:boolean dueDate:datetime allowAnonymousAnswers:boolean answersClose:boolean disableSelfService:boolean isActive:boolean options:json  selfServiceEmail:email selfServiceLink:string votingType:string
scripts.generateBreakout: strapi generate:api breakout title:string isDeleted:boolean type:string internalComment:text isReadOnly:boolean dueDate:datetime backgroundColor:string description:text  externalMeetingURL:string externalMeetingURLButtonText:string  mainCategory:json order:integer  textColor:string   zoomMeetingId:string zoomMeetingPassword:string zoomMeetingUrl:string
scripts.generateTable: strapi generate:api table title:string isDeleted:boolean type:string internalComment:text isReadOnly:boolean dueDate:datetime backgroundColor:string backgroundImage:string capacity:integer description:text  image:string  isClosed:boolean isMuteOnEnter:boolean order:integer  seatColor:string
scripts.generateTicketcode: strapi generate:api ticketcode title:string isDeleted:boolean type:string internalComment:text isReadOnly:boolean dueDate:datetime company:string email:email firstName:string jobTitle:string lastName:string status:string
scripts.generateText: strapi generate:api text title:string isDeleted:boolean type:string internalComment:text isReadOnly:boolean dueDate:datetime htmlText:text key:string text:text
scripts.generateNotification: strapi generate:api notification title:string isDeleted:boolean type:string internalComment:text isReadOnly:boolean dueDate:datetime image:string subtitle:text
scripts.generateSupport: strapi generate:api support title:string isDeleted:boolean type:string internalComment:text isReadOnly:boolean dueDate:datetime email:email text:text status:json
scripts.generateTypes: yarn generateSpeaker && yarn generateExhibitor && yarn generateAttendee && yarn generateSchedule && yarn generateStage && yarn generateVote && yarn generateBreakout && yarn generateTable && yarn generateTicketcode && yarn generateText && yarn generateNotification && yarn generateSupport
